sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; import { authService } from '../../services/auth'; import { geolocationService } from '../../services/geolocation'; const SafetyCheck = () => { const [checkingIn, setCheckingIn] = useState(false); const [lastCheckIn, setLastCheckIn] = useState(null); const [location, setLocation] = useState(null); const userInfo = authService.getUserInfo(); const handleSafetyCheckIn = async () => { setCheckingIn(true); try { const position = await geolocationService.getEnhancedPosition(); setLocation(position); await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 2000)); setLastCheckIn(new Date()); toast.success('Safety check-in successful! Your contacts have been notified.'); } catch (error) { console.error('Check-in error:', error); toast.error('Failed to check in. Please try again.'); } finally { setCheckingIn(false); } }; const handleQuickActions = (action) => { switch (action) { case 'location': toast.info('📍 Location shared with emergency contacts'); break; case 'assistance': toast.info('🆘 Non-emergency assistance requested'); break; case 'update': toast.info('📝 Status update sent to family'); break; default: break; } }; return (

✅ Safety Check-in System

Let your contacts know you're safe and update your status

✅

Safety Status Update

Regular check-ins help us monitor your safety and notify your emergency contacts automatically.

{lastCheckIn && (
✅ Last Check-in: {lastCheckIn.toLocaleString()} {location && (
📍 {location.address}
)}
Status: Safe
)}
⚡ Quick Actions
📋 What happens when you check in:
  • 1 Your current location is recorded securely
  • 2 Emergency contacts receive notification
  • 3 Safety score is updated in real-time
  • 4 Timestamp logged for monitoring
  • 5 Status shared with tourist safety network
⏰ Check-in Frequency:
Morning (6 AM - 12 PM) Recommended
Start your day with a safety check-in
Afternoon (12 PM - 6 PM) Optional
Check-in when changing locations
Evening (6 PM - 10 PM) Important
End your day safely
🛡️ Current Safety Status
Active
System Status
{userInfo?.name || 'Tourist'}
Current User
{location ? 'Located' : 'Unknown'}
Location Status
{lastCheckIn ? 'Recent' : 'Pending'}
Last Check-in
); }; export default SafetyCheck;
